parameters.name: VertexId
parameters.description: Tessellation vertex ID of the vertex for which you want to get the X Y Z position values

title: ITessellation.IGetVertexPoint
description: Gets the X, Y and Z values that describe a tessellation vertex.

parameters.name: VertexId
parameters.description: Tessellation vertex ID of the vertex for which you want to get the X Y Z position values

returns: Array of 3 doubles that describe the tessellation vertex's X, Y, and Z position
